ygData.subject: RE: Psalm Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: The only damage message I have ever gotten when I sing Psalm of Warmth is Mob was burned . I have never gotten a text message in white saying the mob took 5
ygData.messageBody:
The only damage message I have ever gotten when I sing Psalm of Warmth is
"Mob was burned". I have never gotten a text message in white saying the mob
took 5 pts of non-melee damage. I get the white colored message when I have
the thorn shield up. In the fight with two bards where I was singing Warmth
and the other was singing Cooling, I got the "Mob was burned message".
Don't remember seeing the damage message for the Cooling song. I would
guess it would say something like "mob was frozen". As a result, can't
confirm if the two songs cancelled out. It would make sense that they did.
Guess I need to start using the log parser.

Galtin of E'ci


> >
> Sure wish we got the white text message for our damage shields similar to
> what you get when you have the druid thorn buff (not certain of exact
> name). With the thorn buff, it tells you how much non-melee damage the
> mob took when they
> > hit you. Anyone have an idea why we don't get a similar message?
>
> You *do* get the same message. If you weren't, I'd take that
> as a sign that they were canceling eaching other.
>
